name: Keep it alive (Rakowu)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

There is a little soul which will be killed if you spend too much time. You have to figure out your way through the levels. This game is made to confuse. Sometimes you need to drag from left to right and sometimey you just have to click on elements. :) Check EVERYTHING visible, click EVERYTHING :D (Smog and lightning is bad) And yes, it has a ending.

P.d.: Don’t hate me too much for that game :D
